common.appDescription: Save and manage your favorite web pages easily with your personal bookmark clipboard

auth.loginRequiredDescription: Please log in first to manage your bookmarks.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.editModeTip1: Click the eye icon to hide or show widgets.
dashboard.editModeTip2: On desktop, you can drag widgets to change their order.
dashboard.editModeTip3: On mobile, you can change widget order using up/down arrow buttons.
dashboard.editModeTip4: Disabled widgets are displayed semi-transparently and can be reactivated by clicking.

bookmarks.title: Bookmarks
bookmarks.bookmarkSaveError: An error occurred while saving the bookmark.
bookmarks.bookmarkDeleteError: An error occurred while deleting the bookmark.
bookmarks.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?
bookmarks.bookmarkUpdateError: An error occurred while updating the bookmark.
bookmarks.invalidUrlFormat: Please enter a valid URL format
bookmarks.bookmarkDescriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for the bookmark
bookmarks.subCollectionBookmarksDescription: These are bookmarks belonging to sub-collections of this collection.
bookmarks.noSearchResults: No search results. Try a different search term.
bookmarks.faviconRefreshError: An error occurred while refreshing the favicon.
bookmarks.favoriteToggleError: An error occurred while changing favorite status.
bookmarks.reorderError: An error occurred while reordering bookmarks.

collections.title: Collections
collections.collectionSaveError: An error occurred while saving the collection.
collections.collectionDeleteError: An error occurred while deleting the collection.
collections.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this collection?
collections.maxDepthExceeded: Cannot add sub-collections beyond 2 levels deep.
collections.deleteWarning: Bookmarks in this collection will be removed from the collection.

settings.title: Settings
settings.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
settings.settingsSaveError: An error occurred while saving settings.
settings.mainPageDescription: Choose which page to display when you first open the app
settings.exportDataDescription: Export bookmark data to a file
settings.importDataDescription: Import bookmark data from a file
settings.privacyDescription: Bookmarkle safely protects your personal information. All data is encrypted and stored securely, using Google account for safe authentication.
settings.autoBackupDescription: Automatically backup bookmarks and collections periodically
settings.autoBackupFrequencyDescription: Select the interval for automatic backup execution

mobileIconView.editModeDescription: Edit Mode - Hold for 1+ seconds, drag to reorder

settings.trashDescription: Manage deleted bookmarks. They will be permanently deleted automatically after 30 days.
settings.restoreBookmarkConfirm: Do you want to restore this bookmark?
settings.restoreError: An error occurred while restoring the bookmark
settings.permanentlyDeleteBookmarkConfirm: Do you want to permanently delete this bookmark? This action cannot be undone.
settings.permanentlyDeleteError: An error occurred while deleting the bookmark
settings.emptyTrashConfirm: Do you want to permanently delete all bookmarks in the trash? This action cannot be undone.
settings.emptyTrashError: An error occurred while emptying the trash
settings.autoDeleteInfo: Bookmarks in the trash will be permanently deleted automatically after 30 days

extension.title: Extension
extension.extensionLoginError: An error occurred during extension login.

errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

weather.title: Weather
weather.searchPlaceholder: Enter city name (e.g., Seoul, Tokyo, New York)
weather.geolocationNotSupported: This browser does not support location services

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.centerDescription: View and manage all notifications in one place
notifications.bookmarkNotificationsDescription: Track bookmark activity and receive change alerts
notifications.systemNotificationsDescription: Send alerts via the browser extension and the macOS/Windows notification center
notifications.permissionDenied: Notification permission has been denied by the browser
notifications.permissionHelpIntro: To use system notifications, allow notifications for this site in your browser.
notifications.permissionHelpStep1: Click the lock icon (üîí) on the left side of the address bar.
notifications.permissionHelpStep2: In the menu that appears, change ‚ÄòNotifications‚Äô to ‚ÄòAllow‚Äô.
notifications.permissionHelpStep3: If you open ‚ÄòSite settings‚Äô, change the Notifications option to Allow and close the tab.
notifications.permissionHelpStep4: Refresh the page, then turn on system notifications again.
notifications.noNotificationsDescription: New bookmark activities will be displayed here

messages.bookmarkAdded: A new bookmark has been added

premium.pricingDescription: Select a plan that fits your needs and make bookmark management more efficient
premium.premiumFeatureRequired: This feature is only available in the Premium plan

settings.resetDescription: Show subscription banner and modal again.
settings.resetConfirm: Do you want to reset subscription settings? The subscription banner and modal will be shown again.

premium.manageYourSubscription: Manage your subscription and change settings
premium.confirmCancel: Do you want to cancel your subscription?
premium.cancelError: An error occurred while canceling subscription
premium.cancelWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: Current usage exceeds the free plan limit.
premium.cancelWarningNote: Your existing data will be retained after cancellation, but you won't be able to add new items. Please delete some data if necessary or keep the Premium plan.
premium.cancelLimitExceeded: Subscription has been canceled. Your current usage exceeds the limit, so you cannot add new items. Your existing data will remain unchanged.

earlyUserBenefits.title: Early User Benefits
earlyUserBenefits.verified: You have been verified as an early user who joined during the beta period.
earlyUserBenefits.description: You can continue to use the features you used during the beta period for free.

premium.stripeIntegrationPending: Stripe payment integration is being prepared

faq1.question: Can I upgrade from Free to Premium at any time?
faq1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade at any time. When you upgrade, you can immediately use all Premium features.

faq2.question: Will my data be deleted if I cancel the Premium plan?
faq2.answer: No, your data will remain intact. However, you won't be able to use Premium features and the Free plan limits will apply.

faq3.question: What's the difference between yearly and monthly subscriptions?
faq3.answer: Yearly subscriptions are offered at a 17% discount compared to monthly subscriptions, and you can receive additional benefits with annual payments.

pricing.launchDescription: To celebrate the official launch, we're offering special pricing. Early users can continue to use existing features for free.

banner.title: Upgrade to Premium for more features!

modal.title: Upgrade to Premium Subscription!
modal.description: Bookmarkle is now officially open! Subscribe to Premium to access more features.
modal.features: With Premium subscription, enjoy unlimited bookmarks, advanced search, custom themes, and more.
modal.earlyUserBenefitDesc: Early users who joined during the beta period can receive special discount benefits.
modal.betterService: We will continue to work hard to provide better service.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.description: Manage all users and view statistics.
